description.value: Medical devices are any internally implanted and external devices and/or aids used by the patient (in the past) to reduce the effects of functional limitations in organ systems or to facilitate the treatment of a disease.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-MedicalDevice-Device](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicalDevice-Device) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
